page.title: 10Biddestone school
page.content: 27 children aged between 4and 11. Mainly from Biddestone,1 from Slaughterford,2 from West Yatton. 2 classes:Infants(4-8) and Juniors (8-11). 2 teachers inc.Headmaster. 2 buildings, the original school (2 classrooms,kitchen & office) and a mobile "terrapin " classroom for the infants. School has a BBC computer, 2 black & white TVs,a piano, percussion instruments,recorders and PE equipment The emphasis is on musical and environmental studies and on craft. A minibus is used for educational visits and to take children for weekly swimming lessons. Funds for the minibus are raised by school sales. Cooked lunches are provided but most children bring packed lunch. Most children go on to the Comprehensive School in Corsham.
